name: thumpingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely: The results of this collaboration are thumpingly tedious. The salad here is thumpingly full of fresh and unusual flavours.
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the songs are thumpingly well sung.He made his name as the director of some thumpingly predictable Hollywood blockbusters.This poem seems like a thumpingly obvious effort to find parallels between ancient mythology and current events.The lyrics contain some thumpingly unsubtle references to drug-taking.This horse is a thumpingly good bet to win the Gold Cup.
